room_title: Escape room "Mutiny" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: So much fun! And the owners are super nice and great supporters of other small businesses in the Pdx area. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Mutiny" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: Mutiny was my first escape room, and I really enjoyed it! The owners did a great job of explaining everything beforehand, and the puzzles were a great challenge. Now I want to go back and do the other rooms, too!

room_title: Escape room "Mutiny" by Labyrinth Escape Games in Portland
review: Brought our whole crew in for the Mutiny experience and loved the challenge! Looking forward to trying the other rooms next.
